page.title: 12LIFE STYLES (2)
page.content: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE {SCOUT AND GUIDE ASSOCIATIONS} 29TH.Glos.Scout Troop 24 members Cub Scout Packs-Panther 27 members -Jaguar 26 members -Leopard 16 members Guides -Monday 24 members -Friday 30 members Brownies -Tuesday 24 members -Wednes. 24 members -Thurs. 24 members Javelin Venture Scout Unit Venture Band,Scouts and Guides {PLAY GROUPS} Brockworth Play Group - Youth Centre Moorfield Play Group - St.Georges Glebe Hall Play Group - Glebe Hall {YOUTH CLUBS} Youth Centre, meets every evening {DANCING Brockworth Dancing Class
